content.body:
**CRITICAL for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance**

Tasks:
- [ ] Test with NVDA/JAWS/VoiceOver screen readers
- [ ] Add descriptive ARIA labels throughout UI
- [ ] Add landmarks (main, nav, complementary, region)
- [ ] Add proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3)
- [ ] Add progress indicators with ARIA (aria-valuenow, aria-valuemin, aria-valuemax)
- [ ] Add live regions for dynamic content (aria-live)
- [ ] Test navigation flow with screen reader

**Why Important:** Screen reader users currently cannot use the app effectively. This is required for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

**Time Estimate:** 2-3 hours

content.body:

Tasks:
- [ ] Verify color contrast ratios (WCAG AA: 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text and UI components)

- [ ] Add focus visible styles for all interactive elements
- [ ] Ensure minimum touch target sizes (44x44px for mobile)
